original_text: And it shall be forgiven all the congregation of the children of Israel, and the stranger that sojourneth among them; seeing all the people were in ignorance.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중과 그들 중에 거류하는 타국인도 사함을 받을 것은 온 백성이 부지중에 범죄하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: all the congregation of the children of Israel
and the stranger that sojourneth among them
seeing all the people were in ignorance
